extendedInfo.description: "Chaos Storm is an epic role-playing strategy. It takes only 5 minutes to learn, and highly impressive! The story takes place on a mystical land. Once a demon war nearly swallowed its history, when 3 races, human, elves, and orcs, united together and sealed the devil lord. Now with each nation holds a seal stone, everyone believes only by safeguarding the stone could they protect their kingdoms well, until one day all seal stones are broken, and a new catastrophe befalls. As a new lord, you must develop your kingdom quickly and muster a formidable force in time to battle the chaos legion. In time, you will meet many capable heroes, research technologies and magic which make you even stronger. And youâre not fighting alone. By creating or joining an alliance, you will share the alliance technologies with your companies, defeat the legion, and bring the final peace back to this lands. GAME FEATURES: - Well designed guidance system: it takes only 3 minutes to learn, and is extremely fun!- Perform numerous challenging quests. - Enjoy gorgeous graphics. - FREE updates with new quests, items, heroes, and more! - Battle other players LIVE. - Choose from 3 racesâHUMAN, ELF, ORCâeach with different soldiers, guardian creatures, and heroes. - Construction, research, troop training, attack, and defense strategy are completely under your control! - Ally with other players to make you stronger! - You will NOT feel alone: Private Chats, Alliance Chats, Public Chats, Forums...full of interaction and communication! ...and much MORE! ""Awesome game! If you like empire building game, or you are a fan of ogame/travian/evony on PC, I think you will surely enjoy this."" ""When I looked at the screenshots, I knew it would be a good game for my taste. But now I will say this game totally exceeds my expectation!"" ""A great game that you will regret to miss!"""

reviews.title: One problem
reviews.comment: When I go to type in numbers for troops it zoom in and won\'t zoom out. please fix

reviews.title: Asus tf700

reviews.title: screen zoom
reviews.comment: the screen zooms in when the keyboard opens, but won\'t zoom back out or scroll around when finished typing. ive managed to avoid this glitch as much as possible, but its now making it impossible to build anew castle due to the fact the \'operate\' button is not visible after typing new castle\'s name. Droid RAZR

reviews.title: Don\'t download!
reviews.comment: Won\'t even open. It just stays at loading screen then closes. Fix this problem ASAP. I\'m using an HTC EVO 4G.
